match.title: Make the perfect match!
match.instructions: Here you can see all our fluffballs! Swipe right to see the next one, left to go back. And if you've decided, press the adopt button!

pets.name: Pepita
pets.description: Pepita loves sunbathing in the park. This fluffball is waiting to be adopted.
